Metadata.title: visicheck.ai – AI Visibility Tracking
Metadata.description: Track the visibility of your domains and brands in ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini and Perplexity.

Landing.heroTitle: Make visibility in AI search systems measurable.
Landing.heroSubtitle: visicheck.ai shows how brands appear in ChatGPT & Co – and how to systematically improve that visibility.
Landing.problemTitle: Your brand already lives in AI answers – you just can't see it.
Landing.problemPoint1Desc: More and more users rely on AI recommendations instead of traditional search results.
Landing.problemPoint2Desc: Every answer is unique – manual checking doesn't scale.
Landing.problemPoint3Desc: SEO tools measure Google rankings. Who measures visibility in ChatGPT?
Landing.whyAiVisCol1: Visibility used to start with a position on page 1 of Google – today it begins in AI-generated answers that often require no click at all. Users ask their questions directly to AI systems, receive a curated answer, and make their decision without ever seeing your website or a search result. If you don't appear in those answers, you're effectively invisible – even if your website still has good SEO rankings.
Landing.whyAiVisCol2: At the same time, AI systems select only a few brands as references and keep returning to these preferred sources. Companies that are present in the AI context today become part of the dataset that models learn from, while invisible brands are barely considered in future answers. Visibility in AI answers therefore means more leads, lower acquisition costs, and stronger brand authority, because AI only recommends reliable sources.
Landing.uspSectionSubtitle: We track brand visibility in AI models – but that's not all.
Landing.usp1Desc: See how often and where your brand appears in AI responses.
Landing.usp2Desc: Not just mentions – but ranking and tone.
Landing.usp3Desc: ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude & more in one dashboard.
Landing.usp4Desc: Define prompts – visicheck.ai measures automatically every day.
Landing.usp5Desc: Discover why others are visible – and you're not.
Landing.techMessage1: visicheck.ai is not a marketing gimmick.
Landing.techMessage2: visicheck.ai is analytics infrastructure for the AI era.
Landing.startStep1Desc: Define the questions you want AI models to answer.
Landing.startStep2Desc: Choose the brands you want to benchmark against.
Landing.startStep3Desc: Get your first visibility insights the next day.
Landing.whyPoint1: Built for AI search, not legacy SEO
Landing.whyPoint2: Built for growth teams, not vanity metrics
Landing.pricingSubtitle: Start monitoring your AI visibility now – no hidden costs.
Landing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about brand visibility in AI models.
Landing.faq1Q: What does 'brand visibility in AI models' mean?
Landing.faq1A:
Brand visibility in AI models describes how often and in what context your brand appears in responses from AI systems – for example in product recommendations, industry questions or problem solving.

Examples of such systems include OpenAI (with ChatGPT), Google (Gemini) or Perplexity AI.
Landing.faq2Q: Why is this topic becoming important right now?
Landing.faq2A:
More and more users are asking purchase and research questions directly to AI assistants instead of traditional search engines. If your brand doesn't appear there, you practically don't exist for this audience.

In short: AI is a new discovery channel.
Landing.faq3Q: How do AI models decide which brands to mention?
Landing.faq3A:
AI models don't access your marketing in real-time but are based on:

• Public web content
• Press articles & trade media
• Product reviews & forums
• Structured company information
• Brand consistency across many sources

The more frequently and clearly your brand appears in relevant contexts, the higher the chance of being mentioned.
Landing.faq4Q: Is this the same as SEO?
Landing.faq4A:
Not exactly.

SEO optimizes for rankings in search engines. AI visibility optimizes for mentions in responses.

Differences:
• No traditional rankings
• Less focus on keywords
• More focus on entities, authority and context
• Brand strength matters more than individual pages

Many already refer to this as GEO (Generative Engine Optimization).
Landing.faq5A:
You can't directly manipulate them — but you can influence the data they train on or cite from:

• High-quality PR content
• Mentions in trade media
• Structured content (e.g. Wikidata, Knowledge Panels)
• Expert contributions
• Consistent brand positioning

It's more reputation building than traditional technical optimization.
Landing.faq6Q: How do I measure my brand visibility in AI?
Landing.faq6A:
Typical methods:

• Regular prompt tests ('Which providers for X are there?')
• Share-of-voice analyses across different AI systems
• Comparison with competitors
• Tracking brand mentions in AI responses
• Combination with traditional digital PR monitoring

That's exactly what visicheck.ai was built for.
Landing.faq7A:
Currently especially:

• SaaS & Tech
• E-Commerce
• Consulting & Services
• Healthcare
• Finance
• B2B solutions with complex products

Anywhere users ask complex questions.
Landing.faq8Q: What happens if my brand isn't mentioned?
Landing.faq8A:
Then a competitor takes the attention — even if your product is objectively better.

AI responses appear authoritative. Whoever is mentioned gains trust.
Landing.faq9Q: How long does it take to see results?
Landing.faq9A:
This is not a quick-win channel.

Realistically:
• First effects: 2–3 months
• Noticeable presence: 3–6 months
• Sustainable visibility: ongoing process

It closely resembles building thought leadership.
Landing.faq10A:
Very likely not.

AI response systems are increasingly being integrated into operating systems, browsers and search engines. Brand visibility in AI will become as fundamental as SEO was 15 years ago.
Landing.finalCtaDesc: Start now and see how your brand performs in AI responses.
Landing.footerTagline: AI search visibility platform for data-driven teams.

About.heroTitle: Built by online marketers. For online marketers.
About.heroSubtitle: visicheck.ai isn't a lab experiment – it was born from the daily work of an agency that fights for brand visibility every day.
About.storyP1: visicheck.ai was developed by the experienced online marketers and SEO experts at contentking.de. The reason: The demand for concrete data on brand visibility in AI models keeps growing – and there was no tool to fill that gap.
About.storyP2: Every feature in visicheck.ai is based on real customer requirements and reflects current market demand. No theoretical metrics – just practical insights that truly help.
About.storyP3: Our goal: Give brands the tools to stay visible in the new era of AI search – data-driven, understandable and immediately actionable.
About.originDesc: contentking.de is an established online marketing agency with years of experience in SEO, content strategy and digital brand building. visicheck.ai was born from this expertise and direct client contact.
About.value1Desc: Every feature solves a real customer problem.
About.value2Desc: Decisions based on facts, not gut feeling.
About.value3Desc: Clear pricing, honest communication, no hidden costs.
About.ctaTitle: Ready to measure your AI visibility?
About.ctaDesc: Start now and see how your brand performs in AI responses.

Onboarding.title: Getting Started
Onboarding.subtitle: Start your AI visibility tracking in three simple steps.
Onboarding.domainsDesc: First, add your domain and enter the brand name that the AI models should look for. This tells visicheck.ai which website and brand to monitor.
Onboarding.promptsDesc: Create a prompt set with the questions to ask AI models. You can enter prompts manually or have them generated automatically – tailored to your industry and keywords.
Onboarding.configDesc: Link your domain with a prompt set and choose the interval (daily, weekly, monthly). Your visibility checks will then run automatically.

Documentation.metaDescription: Learn in detail how visicheck.ai works: Domains & Brands, Prompt Sets, Tracking Runs, Sentiment Analysis, Competitor Comparison and more.
Documentation.heroSubtitle: Everything you need to know about visicheck.ai – feature by feature.
Documentation.overviewP1: visicheck.ai is an AI search visibility platform that measures how your brand appears in responses from leading AI models. We track visibility in ChatGPT (OpenAI), Gemini (Google), Claude (Anthropic) and Perplexity – automatically and continuously.
Documentation.overviewP2: The platform is designed for marketing teams, SEO experts and businesses that want to understand whether and how their brand is perceived in the new era of AI search.
Documentation.domainsDesc: Add the domains and brands whose AI visibility you want to monitor. Each domain can include a URL and a brand name. visicheck.ai automatically detects mentions and source citations in AI responses for your registered domains.
Documentation.domainsFeature2: Automatic detection of mentions and citations
Documentation.promptSetsDesc: Prompt sets define the questions that are regularly sent to AI models. Formulate prompts that reflect your industry and target audience – for example 'What tools are there for X?' or 'What is the best provider for Y?'.
Documentation.promptSetsFeature1: Write your own prompts or auto-generate them
Documentation.promptSetsFeature2: Auto-generation: enter a keyword and receive common user questions
Documentation.promptSetsFeature3: Group and organize prompts by topic
Documentation.configsDesc: Link domains with prompt sets and define how often checks should run. Supported intervals: daily, weekly, monthly or on-demand. Also select the target country for queries.
Documentation.configsFeature1: Flexible intervals: daily, weekly, monthly or manual
Documentation.configsFeature2: Country-specific queries (DE, AT, CH, UK, US, ES, FR, NL)
Documentation.runsDesc: A tracking run sends your prompts to the configured AI models and captures the responses. For each response, mentions of your domains, cited source URLs and the full response text are stored.
Documentation.runsFeature2: Detailed results per prompt and provider
Documentation.competitorDesc: See at a glance which domains and brands are mentioned most frequently in AI responses to your prompts. Compare your own visibility directly with your competitors – broken down by mentions and source citations.
Documentation.competitorFeature1: Automatic detection of all mentioned domains
Documentation.competitorFeature2: Direct comparison: your domain vs. competitors
Documentation.sourcesDesc: Analyze which URLs AI models cite as sources. Understand which content the models consider relevant – and use these insights for your content strategy.
Documentation.sourcesFeature1: All cited URLs at a glance
Documentation.sentimentDesc: Understand not just whether, but how AI models talk about your brand. Sentiment analysis rates each response as positive, neutral or negative and shows you the trend over time.
Documentation.sentimentFeature2: Distribution by provider (ChatGPT vs. Gemini vs. Claude)
Documentation.sentimentFeature3: Historical sentiment trend and prompt ranking
Documentation.teamDesc: Work as a team: invite colleagues via email and share access to all domains, prompt sets and results. Each team has an owner who manages memberships.
Documentation.teamFeature3: Up to 3 or unlimited members depending on plan
Documentation.pricingDesc: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Every plan includes a monthly prompt quota, access to all AI models and all countries. Billing is handled via Stripe – secure and transparent.
Documentation.modelsDesc: visicheck.ai currently tracks visibility in the following AI models:
Documentation.modelChatGPT: ChatGPT (OpenAI) – the most widely used AI model worldwide
Documentation.modelGemini: Gemini (Google) – directly integrated into Google Search
Documentation.modelClaude: Claude (Anthropic) – known for nuanced and detailed responses
Documentation.modelPerplexity: Perplexity AI – AI search with real-time source citations
Documentation.ctaDesc: Create your free account now and start tracking your AI visibility.
